operational.description: [sample] Application doesn't scale past one service currently, vertical scaling only
operational.business-rationale: This will cause issues for the business growing

architectural.description: [sample] We have blog, cms and ecommerce functionality embedded in a single service in terms of responsibilities
architectural.business-rationale: These need to be separated out for scale and management reasons

quality.description: [sample] There are zero unit or integration tests currently
quality.business-rationale: This is risk that we pass on to an external quality check (QA's) which is expensive
